attributes.action: IMMEDIATELY REMOVE ALL LINKS WITH THE CORRUPT BRITISH VIRGIN ISLANDS.
attributes.additional_details: Not only are we the biggest funder of terrorism on the planet, we are now the place where corrupt foreign (and probably our own) government members KNOW they are safe to stash their stolen national funds in British offshore accounts.  This is NOT something any honest person would want to be associated with.  If the offshore status CANNOT be removed then ANY and ALL sovereign British links to the British Virgin Islands should be severed and the word 'British' removed from the name of the place.
